details.title: Two-stage method for joint time delay and Doppler shift estimation

authors.affiliation: Dept. of Electron. Eng., Beijing Inst. of Technol., Beijing
authors.name: R. Tao

details.abstract: The focus of this research is to provide a fast and precise method for joint time delay and Doppler shift estimation. The main procedure is divided into two stages. In the first stage, the pre- weighted Zoom fast Fourier transform and quadratic surface fitting methods are used for fast computing the ambiguity function and the for coarse estimation, respectively. In the second stage, the values near the coarse estimates are calculated and quadratic surface fitting method is used again for fine estimation. The two-stage method reduces the computational load without losing the precision. Simulation and experimental results are used to demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed method.

ieee.title: Joint Estimation of Time Delay and Doppler Shift for Band-Limited Signals
ieee.displayText: Say Song Goh, Tim N. T. Goodman, Fuchun Shang, "Joint Estimation of Time Delay and Doppler Shift for Band-Limited Signals", Signal Processing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 58, pp. 4583-4594, 2010, ISSN 1053-587X.

ieee.title: Improved method of pre-weighed Zoom FFT
ieee.displayText: Kui Wang, Ran Tao, Tao Shan, "Improved method of pre-weighed Zoom FFT", Signal Processing 2008. ICSP 2008. 9th International Conference on, pp. 2438-2441, 2008.

ieee.title: Performance Evaluation of Practical Passive Source Localization Using Two Software Defined Radios
ieee.displayText: Junming Wei, Changbin Yu, "Performance Evaluation of Practical Passive Source Localization Using Two Software Defined Radios", Communications Letters IEEE, vol. 20, pp. 1880-1883, 2016, ISSN 1089-7798.

ieee.title: Parameters estimation of LFM echoes based on relationship of time delay and Doppler shift
ieee.displayText: Tao Sun, Xiuming Shan, Jing Chen, "Parameters estimation of LFM echoes based on relationship of time delay and Doppler shift", Image and Signal Processing (CISP) 2012 5th International Congress on, pp. 1489-1494, 2012.

ieee.title: An improved algorithm for passive bistatic radar detection and parameters estimation
ieee.displayText: Cai-sheng Zhang, Guo-jun Li, Xiao-ming Tang, You He, "An improved algorithm for passive bistatic radar detection and parameters estimation", Signal Processing (ICSP) 2010 IEEE 10th International Conference on, pp. 2303-2306, 2010.

ieee.title: Analysis of cross-correlation detector for passive radar applications
ieee.displayText: Jun Liu, Hongbin Li, Braham Himed, "Analysis of cross-correlation detector for passive radar applications", Radar Conference (RadarCon) 2015 IEEE, pp. 0772-0776, 2015.
